QueryDefinition.Query:
With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}.chunk_person where chunk_id = {0} ), constype AS( select code, text from {sc}.lookup where lookup_type_id = 18 ), x AS( select distinct t.patid, t.eventdate, t.staffid, m.readcode, NULL as value_as_number, '' as unit, t.data2 as range_low, t.data3 as range_high, MOD(t.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, concat(t.patid,to_char(t.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(con.constype, 99)) as temp_visit_occurrence_id, -- nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id, con.constype, constype.text as visit_description, 0 as operator_concept_id, case when t.data1::bigint != 0 then l.text else '' end as value_source_value, CONCAT(CONCAT(cast(e.enttype as varchar),'-'), e.description) as source_code, m.desc as medical_description from ch join {sc}.test t on t.patid = ch.person_id JOIN {sc}.entity e ON t.enttype = e.enttype and e.data_fields = 4 join {sc}.consultation con on t.patid = con.patid and t.consid = con.consid left join constype on constype.code = con.constype JOIN {sc}.medical m ON t.medcode = m.medcode left JOIN {sc}.lookup l ON t.data1 = l.code::text AND l.lookup_type_id = 85 /*TQU - Test Qualifier*/ -- where t.eventdate is not null -- and con.eventdate is not null ) select x.*, nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id from x order by x.patid GO With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}.chunk_person where chunk_id = {0} ), constype AS( select code, text from {sc}.lookup where lookup_type_id = 18 ), x AS( select distinct t.patid, t.eventdate, t.staffid, m.readcode, t.data2 as value_as_number, case when t.data3::bigint != 0 then l2.text when e.enttype = 284 and (t.data2 is not null and t.data2::bigint !=0) then 'week' --Enttype (code) 284 refers to gestational age in weeks so the unit is hard coded else '' end as unit, t.data5 as range_low, t.data6 as range_high, MOD(t.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, concat(t.patid,to_char(t.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(con.constype, 99)) as temp_visit_occurrence_id, -- nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id, con.constype, constype.text as visit_description, case when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '=' then 4172703 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '>' then 4172704 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '<=' then 4171754 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '>=' then 4171755 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '<' then 4171756 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = '~' then 0 when t.data1::bigint != 0 and l.text = 'Data Not Entered' then 0 else 0 end as operator_concept_id, case when t.data4::bigint != 0 then l3.text else '' end as value_source_value, CONCAT(CONCAT(cast(e.enttype as varchar),'-'), e.description) as source_code, m.desc as medical_description from ch join {sc}.test t on t.patid = ch.person_id JOIN {sc}.entity e ON t.enttype = e.enttype and e.data_fields in (7,8) join {sc}.consultation con on t.patid = con.patid and t.consid = con.consid left join constype on constype.code = con.constype JOIN {sc}.medical m ON t.medcode = m.medcode
left JOIN {sc}.lookup l ON t.data1 = l.code::text AND l.lookup_type_id = 56 /*OPR - Operator*/ left JOIN {sc}.lookup l2 ON t.data3 = l2.code::text AND l2.lookup_type_id = 83 /*SUM - Specimen Unit of Measure*/ left JOIN {sc}.lookup l3 ON t.data4 = l2.code::text AND l3.lookup_type_id = 85 /*TQU - Test Qualifier*/ -- where t.eventdate is not null -- and con.eventdate is not null ) select x.*, nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id from x order by x.patid
